title: Ultrathin defective heterojunction for visible light NO removal: correlation between microstructure and reaction mechanisms
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,3301-3316
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00362D, Paper
Reshalaiti Hailili, Zelong Li, Xu Lu, Hua Sheng, Detlef W. Bahnemann, Jincai Zhao
Defective BiVO4–BiOCl heterojunctions promoted the visible light NO (∼ppb) removal and inhibited the toxic intermediate (NO2) generation due to strong built-in interfacial electric field contact at the junction interface.
